forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with a steady, soaking rain during the afternoon hours. Increasing winds. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
